name: Bond authorization Other Activities of Such Lenders
text: §207-6  Bond authorization.  The director of finance may with the approval of the governor, issue from time to time general obligation bonds pursuant to chapter 39, part I not exceeding $500,000 for the granting of loans pursuant to the purposes of this part. [L 1961, c 194, §7; am L 1963, c 114, §1; Supp, §98L-7; HRS §207-6]
